snippet: If separate trials had been approved for former Gov. Bob McDonnell of Virginia and his wife, she would have testified in her husband’s defense, according to a court document made public Wednesday.
abstract: Document from Federal District Court in Virginia indicates that if separate corruption trials had been approved for former Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell and his wife Maureen, she would have testified in her husband’s defense.
lead_paragraph: If separate trials had been approved for former Gov. Bob McDonnell of Virginia and his wife, she would have testified in her husband’s defense, according to a court document made public Wednesday.

headline.main: Virginia: Ex-Governor’s Wife Would Have Backed Him
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Ex-Governor’s Wife Would Have Backed Him
